/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the sidewalk. A few cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting its warm glow from the left side of the image, illuminating the scene with a soft, inviting light. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, capturing the harmony between nature and cityscape.
